OUR MISSION STATEMENT

We promote the human-animal bond by saving and serving pets in need and by providing compassionate care, lifesaving programs and humane animal control.

  

OUR VISION

In partnership with our communities and donors, we provide effective services and programs to offer animals every opportunity to be treated with respect and kindness.
